name: @super-actions/conditions
description: Conditions for Github issues and pull requests.
author: Ivan Fonseca <ivanfon@riseup.net>

scripts.test: TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register --extensions ts --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options html=true,json=false,inline=true 'test/**/*.test.ts'
scripts.test:watch: TS_NODE_FILES=true mocha --require ts-node/register --require tsconfig-paths/register --extensions ts --watch --watch-files test 'test/**/*.test.ts'
